page.title: 03THE FOOD WE EAT IN CHALFORD
page.content: We usually have three meals a day,breakfast,dinner and tea.For breakfast I have toast,marmalade,a drink of orange juice and sometimes a yoghurt.I have my mid-day meal at school.We eat off plates and use knives and forks.At school we have a variety of different foods.Today we had chipped potatoes and baked beans in tomato sauce and sausages.We have water to drink,out of beakers.We had chocolate ice-cream or crackers and cheese and a glass of milk for sweet.Some children take sandwiches for school dinner and some go home. For tea I have cauliflower cheese and potato.I drink tea with my main meal.For pudding I have apple crumble. Most people also eat bread and butter or margarine.
